name: Victory Boxing
summary: Your goal is to topple the Champ, a perfect fighter who was born to become the heavyweight champion of the world. But, you must defeat 30 Chumps to get to the Champ, and they won't go down without a fight. Work on your jabs, hooks, and uppercuts along with your blocking and footwork. Master the devastating multi-hit combos, and you just might have a shot at the Champ. But will you be good enough?
